rationale: The agent took a fundamentally different approach from the ground truth. The ground truth correctly identifies that chunk_rescorer tests should be skipped in release builds (non-snapshot builds) by updating the test assumption logic in InferenceRestIT.java. The agent instead attempted to enable the feature flag globally in the release-tests.sh build script, which contradicts the intent: the task is to fix tests FAILING because the feature is behind a flag in release builds, not to enable the feature in release builds. The agent's approach would mask the issue rather than properly skip tests that rely on snapshot-only features. This is a critical misunderstanding of the requirement. The agent modified a completely different file (.buildkite/scripts/release-tests.sh) instead of the test configuration file (InferenceRestIT.java), demonstrating incomplete analysis of the problem. No unsolicited documentation was added.
